name: Myoubouh Catcher Kickstarter English Demo
description:
Myoubouh Catcher's demo for his Kickstarter campaign is online. Enjoy a few minutes of gameplay on Myoubouh Catcher.

This demo is not natively compatible with the main controllers on the market. The final game will have full compatibility with the PS4, Xbox One and Nintendo GamePad Pro Switch controllers. This demo exists to show the main concept of the game.

Have fun !

Find the game's Kickstarter page here :

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/myoubouhcatcher/myoubouh-catcher?ref=discov...
